mapper.resultMap: select id, job_name, bean_name, method_name, method_params, cron_expression, status, remark, create_time, create_by, update_by, update_time, delete_by, delete_time from tool_quartz_job
mapper.insert: insert into tool_quartz_job( job_name, bean_name, method_name, path, type, size, create_by, create_time )values( #{jobName}, #{beanName}, #{methodName}, #{path}, #{type}, #{size}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.update:
update tool_local_storage
name = #{name},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = sysdate()
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update tool_local_storage set delete_time = sysdate(),delete_by=#{username} where id=#{id}
